resources.string: %1$s with size %2$.1f has been made by %3$s

A high-end shoe shop is a luxurious store that specializes in selling high-quality, designer shoes. The shop itself is likely to be elegantly designed and decorated, with polished wood floors and elegant fixtures. The shoes on display are likely to be from top designers and brands, and may include a range of styles such as pumps, sandals, boots, and more. The prices for these shoes are likely to be high, reflecting their high quality and designer status. The shop may also offer a range of other services, such as shoe repair and customization. Overall, a high-end shoe shop is the perfect place for someone who values quality and style in their footwear.
The next screen shows a list of all the shoes currently on the platform. On that screen click the + icon to add a new shoe.
